title: 【Tshock】一个简便的开服联机工具 永久更新
author: 灼眼丶夏娜
txt_content:
本帖最后由 灼眼丶夏娜 于 2016-5-22 13:05 编辑 
          


 本软件由Tshock汉化组汉化
                             

            
           TShockCN  Beta 6.2
                 <font color="orange" size="3">更新日志：

6.1重大bug修复 请尽快更新，，，，

TShock 4.3.13 汉化 Beta 6.2
 API版本 1.22
 汉化作者: RYH Sylar Blambin(排名不分先后)
 感谢beta5的所有用户 玩家们

重新汉化了一遍。。中文刷物品原生集成。。。。把以前一些英文的东西汉化了 。。某R的强迫症真是要死了

以下是官方4.3.12的更新日志：

Welcome to TShock 4.3.13 for Terraria 1.3.0.8 (API v1.22). This release fixes some bugs and introduces some new features for developers. Download via Github Releases

Changelog:
 Fixed an issue preventing TShock from starting on certain mono versions (@Wolfje)
 Fixed a deadlock in Wiring (@Wolfje)
 Fixed character styles/gender not being saved properly on first login while SSC is on (@Wight)
 Added a PlayerPermission hook fired whenever a permission check involving said player occurs (when the new TSPlayer.HasPermission method is called) (@Enerdy)
 Resolved an issue where martian invasions and eclipses would have empty messages if AnonymousBossInvasions was set to true (@Wight)
 Added an optional slime parameter to the rain command, allowing slime rain to be started and stopped. New syntax is rain [slime] <start/stop> (@Wight)
 Fixed performance issues due to concurrent dictionary access in TSPlayer (@CoderCow)
 Added an ID property to Regions (@Wight)
 Fixed an issue where region sizes were calculated incorrectly (@Wight)
 Fixed a bug in RegionManager preventing regions adding correctly (@pink_panther)
 Fixed another bug in RegionManager preventing regions adding correctly (@Wight)
 Fixed a routing issue with the /v2/token/create REST endpoint (@Wight)
 Removed the /token/create REST endpoint. /v2/token/create should be used instead. (@Wight)

 


TShock 4.3.12 汉化 Beta 5
 API版本 1.22
 汉化作者: RYH Sylar Blambin(排名不分先后)
 感谢beta4的所有用户 玩家们

全指令中文化
 大部分子指令和参数中文化
 config文件自动生成介绍

Beta 5更新日志
 改善检查更新的文本反馈
 Tshock版本号更新为4.3.12
 以下是官方4.3.12的更新日志
 Fixed issues with TSPlayer.SetTeam not working (@Wight)(Beta2已合并此代码)
 Fixed /butcher not killing bosses in expert difficulty (@Wight)(Beta2已合并此代码)
 API: Deprecated PacketBufferer (now obviated by SendQ) (@Wight)(Beta4已合并此代码)
 API: Building on Windows no longer breaks traps (@Wolfje)
 Fixed bombs, dynamite, and sticky bombs (@Wolfje)(Beta4已合并此代码)
 Removed spammy messages from OnSecondUpdate that confused some server owners (@Wolfje)(Beta4已合并此代码)
 Rewrote some stat tracker code to send actually relevant data to the stats server (@George)
 Added an opt-out command line switch to disable the stat tracker (–stats-optout) (@George)
 Added a unique provider token which can be passed to the stat tracker (–provider-token [token]) for tracking servers from the same GSP. (@George)

Beta 4更新日志
 更改检查更新服务器为tshockcn的服务器
 修复因为检查更新失败而出现的红字报错
 Fixes #1095.
 修复 炸弹 雷管 粘性炸弹 无法使用 “Bombs, Dynamites and stickies work again”
 移除了OnSecondUpdate()里面不重要的信息 “Removed unimportant messages from OnSecondUpdate()”
Deprecated PacketBufferer as its function is now fulfilled by SendQ

Beta 2更新日志
 修复 各种中英混合指令不能使用
 修复 中文NPC传送
 修复 中文BOSS召唤
 修复 中文开活动(入侵)
 合并最新tshock代码
 Tshock修复#1134 and #1131

更新方法
 下载后解压覆盖下去即可</font>
复制代码

  TShock 4.3.13 汉化 Beta 6.2
